flawed_nl_solution:
Since 1 hour is 60 minutes, 20 minutes is 20/60=2/3 of an hour.
Eating 3 potatoes per 20 minutes is 3/(2/3)=<<3/(2/3)=9/2>>9/2 potatoes per hour.
At 9/2 potatoes per hour, it will take Jason 27/9/2=6 hours to eat all of the potatoes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20/60, not 2/3. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
